title: Patch 9
content: n resolution to 1024x768 or 1280x720. Added non-gendered pronouns to Character Creation and started to phase them into dialogues. You can now open the menu with ESC during a roll. Removed the Party Management keybind. Temporarily removed the 'Show on Map' button. Added previews for Cloud Quality settings. Equipment slots no longer light up for non-controlled characters in multiplayer. Improved the error messages for connection errors in the multiplayer lobby and for being unable to join a sessio
